title: (x) The Resurgence Simple font - Univers {Nina}
content:
I’m assuming the font is identical for the “R” logo and for the text next to it “RESURGENCE” in different weights. What font’s are they using here?

Check it out here:  
 [http://theresurgence.com/files/minBlack\_1440x900.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100108030346/http:/theresurgence.com/files/minBlack_1440x900.jpg "http://theresurgence.com/files/minBlack\_1440x900.jpg")
author: joejohnson9182

comments.content: Look at the condensed weights of [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20100108030346/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/).
